name: Cypher
headline: Banking built with on-chain primitives for web3 founders and teams
description: Stablecoins have enabled a new paradigm of companies and employees around that world that have raised capital in USDC and also pay their employees around the world in USDC. For these businesses and professionals, the financial stack for expenses management, payouts and accounting has new challenges and Cypher is solving this.

founders.name: Kuberan Marimuthu, Founder
founders.description: Currently building Cypher (crypto on-chain banking), Ex-Engineering Leader at Coinbase, Amazon & Zenefits. Built spoturtrain.com and scaled it to 2 million active users a month. 3rd time founder.

# Your All in One noncustodial wallet
### Your gateway for crypto universe
Manage and stake crypto across 18+ Ethereum, esp tron & Cosmos blockchains
![Ethereum Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)![Polygon Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)![Tron Icon](https://cypherhq.io/static/tronIcon-f7c996f491643d6621ddeb15ad981046.svg)![Stargaze Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)![Osmosis Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)![Juno Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)
![Install Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/installMobile-1428a22e2026142157719063c2352b2b.svg)![Ethereum Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)![Polygon Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)![Tron Icon](https://cypherhq.io/static/tronIcon-f7c996f491643d6621ddeb15ad981046.svg)![Stargaze Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)![Osmosis Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)![Juno Icon](https://cypherhq.io/)
![Cypher Card](https://cypherhq.io/static/cypherVisaCards-2452d1769dab7f296c851957436e54cb.png)
## Cypher Card
Enjoy the flexibility of virtual and physical Cypher cards
Get Cypher card
I have invite code
![Multi Chain](https://cypherhq.io/static/multiChain-2f5bb182b636d214fe200c728252054a.png)
Load your card with over 500+ supported tokens across 18+ EVM & Cosmos chains.
![Chains Web](https://cypherhq.io/static/chainsWeb-10f61a8d520f2b6ec60ec846e413bcb9.svg)
Manage your card at any time for added security.
![Buy Crypto](https://cypherhq.io/static/buyCrypto-034f6f9a98c1dce776145cc28abaeff6.png)
![POS](https://cypherhq.io/)
Utilize any self-custody wallet to instantly load cards and make seamless payments at over 40 million online and offline merchants worldwide.
![Support 24/7](https://cypherhq.io/static/support24.7-6b75b13e57d2a5de3aaca970188345fb.png)
Be the true owner of your asserts
![Locker](https://cypherhq.io/)
![Cypher Card](https://cypherhq.io/static/cypherVisaCards-2452d1769dab7f296c851957436e54cb.png)
## Cypher Card
Enjoy the flexibility of virtual and physical Cypher cards
Get Cypher card
I have invite code
![Multi Chain Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/multichainMobile-c2a29dff5ee5525f975c61ed4d83a7d3.png)
Manage your card at any time for added security.
![Load Card Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/loadCardMobile-ec97d950580329b373c6a64d5f8f3349.svg)
![Buy Crypto Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/buyCryptoMobile-03c407530a165ff15c110b01d5f2268c.png)
24/7 Support: Our team is always here to help.
![Self Custody Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/selfCustodyMobile-22859f34b55742520251811154e677d4.png)
![True Owner Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/trueOwnerMobile-1470b1b8ed5f4200466cd67805355611.png)
## Cypher Business
Get Started with Cypher Business 
## Financial operating system
### For Web3 Teams
Manage Card Spend & Pay Vendors, Contractors, and Employees Directly from Your Gnosis Safe or Ledger. Built for Web3 Teams & DAOs.
![Business Card](https://cypherhq.io/static/businessCard-1d3df37b38fd321b49f7f5639d9172d6.svg)
## Cypher Corporate Card
Easily issue multiple cards for your team and departments to simplify expense management.
![Wire Transfer](https://cypherhq.io/static/wireTransfer-2b9abc0a1a4287c5f33279dd81f1627f.png)
![Spend Control](https://cypherhq.io/static/spendControl-e6d1975b284b75dcf98694c2c14f47e9.png)![User Management](https://cypherhq.io/static/userManagement-98690d400d4cdccf03783acd9a1cb0bb.png)
![Reimbursements](https://cypherhq.io/static/reimbursements-01d0ed3adca51fa42cf54135250bc688.png)
### Coming soon...
### Accounting Integration
![Quickbook](https://cypherhq.io/)
Sync blockchain/card spend with QuickBooks, Xero effortlessly.
![Xero](https://cypherhq.io/)
![Off Ramp](https://cypherhq.io/static/offRamp-97abfdf28d1ee8de64fe4065a0ec4a80.png)
### Stablecoin Off-Ramp
You can instantly convert your USDC to USD before funding the corporate card or sending out wire transfers.
![Business Card Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/businessCardMobile-f061f16e3b68e90f6d92b47d5960213a.svg)![Wire Transfer Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/wireTransferMobile-cca9037cff4aa582890a8648cbd30585.png)
![User Management Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/userManagementMobile-32fdf3975ec0ba73fbc83da16668e21b.png)![Spend Control Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/spendControlMobile-6ec84238cf56bf82e4d4e36071819af2.svg)
![Reimbursements Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/reimbursementsMobile-99aaef3fd83faaa76d504a252a06299c.png)![Off Ramp Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/offRampMobile-13c829e33208b34c8da722efcc670553.png)![Accounting Mobile](https://cypherhq.io/static/accountingMobile-1604c1d8c2b103ec4975a9b02d70ce77.svg)

generated_description:
# Cypher: Revolutionizing Financial Services for Web3

**Founded**: 2021  
**Location**: Palo Alto, CA  
**Team Size**: 10  
**Y Combinator Batch**: W22  

## Mission
Cypher's mission is clear: to build a banking experience tailored for the rapidly evolving world of Web3. This means leveraging on-chain primitives to empower founders and teams as they navigate this new digital landscape.

## The Challenge
As stablecoins like USDC gain traction, many companies are raising capital and paying employees globally using these digital assets. However, this new financial dynamic comes with a set of challenges—particularly around expense management, payouts, and accounting processes. That’s where Cypher steps in to offer solutions designed specifically for this new paradigm.

## Product Offering
Cypher operates as a **financial operating system** built for Web3 teams, which includes:

- **Cypher Wallet**: A non-custodial wallet enabling users to manage and stake crypto across multiple blockchains, including Ethereum and Cosmos.  
- **Cypher Card**: Both virtual and physical cards that allow users to make payments seamlessly at over 40 million merchants worldwide while managing their crypto assets.  
- **Cypher Business**: A tailored solution for businesses, enabling them to manage card expenditures and streamline payments to vendors, contractors, and employees directly from blockchain wallets.

## Notable Features
- **Multi-Chain Support**: Load cards with over 500 tokens across various chains, ensuring flexibility and choice.
- **Spend Control Tools**: Easily manage spending and reimbursements while ensuring security through customizable user management.
- **Accounting Integration**: Upcoming features will allow syncing blockchain-related expenses with traditional accounting systems like QuickBooks and Xero.

## Backing and Community
Cypher is supported by a range of industry leaders and investors, including big names from the Y Combinator network. This not only validates Cypher's approach but also instills confidence in its services amid the evolving landscape of finance.

## Conclusion
Cypher is at the forefront of redefining the banking experience for the Web3 ecosystem. By tackling the unique challenges that come with using cryptocurrency in business, they are positioning themselves as an essential player in the future of decentralized finance. Whether you’re a budding startup or an established team, Cypher provides the tools you need to succeed in a crypto-first world.

To learn more, visit [Cypher's Website](https://cypherhq.io).
